name: EM
description:
The war against humanity have shifted in the favor the Machines. Play as the protagonist Rockie and use Electro-Magnetic combat to battle the Machine bosses.

For fans of Yakuza style combat and boss fights, this is the game for you!

Key Features

Combat Switching:

Switch between four different fighting styles instantaneously during battle. Each style has it's own advantage and disadvantage in battle.

Diverse Enemy Types:

Each enemy opponent will have a unique fighting style ranging for Boxing, Martial Arts and Capoeira.
